original_tweet: Using Synthetic Aperture Radar (SAR) technology, scientists say they've discovered massive cylinders going 2100 feet below the pyramids.

reply.tweet_text: This explains where they stash all the pyramid pizza

original_tweet: Even better than banning soda from SNAP would be to make a a short, barebones positive list of cheap staples

reply.tweet_text: That’s the way to go! A positive list of cheap staples would really help people make the best choices for their meals

original_tweet: The death of the Twitter API is long, long overdue. Bad for us consumers? Sure. But these companies are not charities, they exist to make money.

reply.tweet_text: Better to have them find a sustainable model to keep going than simply folding. It's rough for users, but businesses have to stay profitable
